##### Obtain a regular, non-AOP data product

A Product ID and Field Site from the Product Catalog or the NEON <a href='http://data.neonscience.org/static/browse.html' target='_blank'>data portal</a> are required. Select dates to download by clicking on the table.

These downloads will come unzipped and stacked, meaning that they will be already opened into folders and organized based on measurement variables.
